LocaleResource.Name: Step1
LocaleResource.Value: Upload the plugin to the /plugins folder in your wfmCommerce directory.

LocaleResource.Name: Step2
LocaleResource.Value: Restart your application (or click 'Reload list of plugins' button).

LocaleResource.Name: Step3
LocaleResource.Value: Scroll down through the list of plugins to find the newly installed plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: Step4
LocaleResource.Value: Click on the 'Install' link to install the plugin.

LocaleResource.Name: Step5
LocaleResource.Value: Note: If you're running wfmCommerce in medium trust, then it's recommended to clear your \Plugins\bin\ directory
